title: Tech Admin
tagline: Expert tech guidance without the full-time cost
overview: Get strategic tech planning combined with hands-on execution. I'll document your stack, identify gaps, build automation, and handle technical initiatives - all on a flexible retainer with fast response times.
whatIOffer: Retainer-based access to 10+ years full-stack expertise
Fast response times (under 1 hour during business hours)
Flexible capacity: steady support or burst initiatives
Document your tech stack and create actionable roadmaps

sections.heading: Recommendations

data.title: Sample Recommendations Report
data.code:
/**
 * RECOMMENDATIONS REPORT
 * Priority: Impact vs Effort Analysis
 */

// HIGH PRIORITY (Quick Wins)
âœ“ Integrate accounting system          // Save 5 hrs/week
âœ“ Automate order notifications         // Reduce errors by 90%
âœ“ Fix failing inventory sync           // Critical for Q4 event

// MEDIUM PRIORITY (Strategic)
- Implement backup automation           // 2 weeks effort
- Migrate to scalable hosting          // Prep for growth
- Build customer portal                // 3-month project

// FUTURE CONSIDERATIONS
- Advanced analytics dashboard          // After data cleanup
- Mobile app development               // Year 2 roadmap

/* PHASED APPROACH */
Phase 1 (Month 1-2): Quick wins + critical fixes
Phase 2 (Month 3-4): Strategic improvements
Phase 3 (Month 5+): Long-term enhancements

â†’ Each recommendation includes ROI estimate
